thread.title: House Oversight Chief Calls for Probe Into Conway’s Remarks on Ivanka Trump Business
thread.title_full: House Oversight Chief Calls for Probe Into Conway’s Remarks on Ivanka Trump Business - Washington Wire - WSJ

author: Byron Tau
title: House Oversight Chief Calls for Probe Into Conway’s Remarks on Ivanka Trump Business
text: The top Republican and Democrat on the House committee tasked with congressional oversight of the executive branch on Thursday called for a probe into remarks by a top White House official promoting Ivanka Trump’s fashion line. In a joint letter to the Office of Government Ethics, House Oversight Committee chairman Republican Jason Chaffetz of Utah and Elijah Cummings of Maryland, the Donald Trump to Dine with Casino Billionaire and GOP Donor Sheldon Adelson
